channel.title: dot-bomb on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in dot-bomb on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Looks like we are not a Dot-Bomb 2.0
item.description: Taking the list of 11 suggestions for Not Being a Dot-Bomb 2.0 courtesy of the dead2.0 blog, I think our plan stacks up pretty well. Have a revenue model, right now. We have two, the early model and the live-n-kicking model. I wouldn’t have got into this otherwise. Be a complete business, not just a feature. Yes, completely covered. We ask the same question over and over: “why will people use our site?
